mods.tableOfContents: Racconto No.1, Op. 25 (featuring Jessica McMillan, flute; Matt Nickel, bassoon; Yukari Sasada, double bass) / Jørgeb Bentzon (1897-1951) -- Rhapsody and the Dance in Magreb 2 (featuring Raymond Baril, soprano saxophone; Sylvia Shadick-Taylor, piano) / Yasuhiro Kasamatsu (b. 1960) -- Massaï (featuring Justin Massey, alto saxophone) / Christian Lauba (b. 1952) -- Prix (featuring Megan Evans, horn; Sylvia Shadick-Taylor, piano): I. Merge; II. Comfort; III. Surge / Charles Stolte (b. 1969)
